# Different formats of the dataset

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Subset of datasets created from the `worldbankdata`

```{r}
wbd.M <- worldbankdata |>
  filter(Income == "L")
```

```{r}
wdb.Bangladesh <- worldbankdata |>
  filter(Country == "Bangladesh") |> filter(Year != 2000)
```
